short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combines Twitch and Kick channels in one simple interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your streaming experience using StreamFusion!
Seamlessly merge your favorite Twitch and Kick streamers into one intuitive interface with StreamFusion.
Elevate your streaming experience and enjoy content like never before.



Features:

Twitch API Integration: Automatically sync with the streaming website to never miss your favorite streams.
Manual Channel Addition: Easily add and manage channels from both Twitch and Kick to personalize your viewing experience.

Experience the best of both platforms in one convenient place.
